title: You are ineligible to earn loot due to leaving or AFK behaviors.
body:
I started a game but i couldn't connect, it showed only a black screen, i turned my wifi off and turned it on then it was ok but the game ended because it was a remake and riot gave me this "You are ineligible to earn loot due to leaving or AFK behaviors" 
How much it will last? When i will be eligible again?

replies.body: There isn't a set amount of time before you'll be able to earn loot again, but once you've played enough games to be honorable again it should unlock.
Same thing happended to me today...
